snippet: Prosecutors said Tuesday they would not file charges against 12 officers who had fired more than 100 bullets at a driver who crashed into several cars in Miami Beach in 2011 and nearly hit members of the police force.
abstract: Prosecutors in Miami-Dade County, Fla, say they will not press criminal charges against 12 police officers who shot over 100 bullets at reckless driver Raymond Herisse in May 2011; prosecutors say officers were justified in shooting Herisse, who was driving in life-threatening manner while fleeing commission of several felonies, nearly running over multiple officers.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said Tuesday they would not file charges against 12 officers who had fired more than 100 bullets at a driver who crashed into several cars in Miami Beach in 2011 and nearly hit members of the police force.

headline.main: After 4 Years, Florida Police Are Cleared in Shooting
headline.print_headline: After 4 Years, Florida Police Are Cleared in Shooting
